name: java-chassis-2.0.0
releaseNotes: Release Notes - Apache ServiceComb - Version java-chassis-2.0.0

issues.title: support generic for highway

swagger generator jaxrs not depend on create dynamic class
swagger generator springmvc not depend on create dynamic class
provide spring data plugin to generate swagger and deserialize
ServiceRegistry manage MicroserviceMeta
change element of HttpParameterType to uppercase

enhance ResponseTypeProcessor to support extractResponseType
support only generate response for a operation
add swagger generator unit test case for List<List<String>>
should ignore parameter of HttpServletRequest when generate swagger

delete duplicated swagger definition: ExtendConst
restore feature: collect java type from swagger model or property

should wrap enum to body at swagger generator pojo mode
tiny optimize for collect primitive default value

consumer should not use ArgumentsMapperDirectReuse when arg index is different
use producer parameter type in producer argument mapper for wrapped body
rest transport switch to weak type core
only special type need convert logic
tiny optimize for DefaultParameterNameProvider

microservice meta not depend on create dynamic class

add tests for different model in client and server

using new proto API to serialize/deserialize Internal Objects

using new proto API to serialize/deserialize Requests/Responses

deserialize arguments in map with arguments actual types

mapper arguments in codec phase for REST

turn on integration tests of highway

support encode/decode Object(Any) types

highway support primitive default values and convert char/byte/short

fix javadoc compile error
@RequestPart should use MultipartFile instead of string
